activities.name: Set test variable at the end

dependsOn.activity: Script Update Portal to deleted if it already exists

activities.name: Script Update Portal to deleted if it already exists

text.value:
with portal_exists as (
	SELECT e.entityId, e.entityName, e.entityTypeId, et.entityTypeName, e.entityStatusTypeId, st.entityStatusTypeName 
	from  azstudioEntityEntities e
	JOIN azstudioEntityEntityTypes et on e.entityTypeId = et.entityTypeId
	JOIN azstudioEntityStatusTypes st on e.entityStatusTypeId = st.entityStatusTypeId
	where e.entityName = '@{pipeline().parameters.CompanyName}'
	and et.entityTypeName = 'Portal'
	and e.entityStatusTypeId != '847EBBEF-B0C9-48A3-9891-212833DDFAC6'
)

update azstudioEntityEntities 
set entityStatusTypeId = '847EBBEF-B0C9-48A3-9891-212833DDFAC6'
where entityId in (select entityId from portal_exists)

insert into bcProcessImpact
(
    processImpactId,
    portalProcessId,
    impactCategoryId,
    impactSeverityId,
    impactTimespanId,
    dateTimeCreated,
    createdById
)
select
NEWID() processImpactId,
portalProcessId,
impactCategoryId,
ist.impactSeverityId,
its.impactTimespanId,
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
'@{pipeline().globalParameters.preparisCreatedById}'
from bcPortalProcess pp
join bcPortalFunctionalArea pfa on pp.portalFunctionalAreaId = pfa.portalFunctionalAreaId
join (select impactCategoryId from bcOverrideSystemImpactCategories where portalId = '@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}') ic on 1=1
join (select impactTimespanId from bcImpactTimespan where portalId = '@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}') its on 1 = 1
join (select impactSeverityId from bcImpactSeverity where sequenceNbr = 1) ist on 1=1
where pfa.portalId = '@{pipeline().parameters.currentPortalId}'
